org.jgrapht.experimental.decomposition
Class PartitionA<V,E>

java.lang.Object
  org.jgrapht.experimental.decomposition.PartitionA<V,E>
Type Parameters:
V -
E - 
public class PartitionA<V,E>
extends java.lang.Object

Implements PartitionA from 'Computing Cut-Based Hierarchical Decompositions in Almost linear time' by RŠcke, Shah, TŠubig (pages 4 - 10) The Algorithm receives a Graph g and partitions it into sets Z_i s.t. for every Z_i: |Z_i| <= 3/4 |E|. Apart form that inter-cluster-edges are a-flow-linked with a \in \Omega (1 / log^2 n)

Author:
moritzfuchs
